metadata.title: CVE-2018-17438 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: A SIGFPE signal is raised in the function H5D__select_io() of H5Dselect.cin the HDF HDF5 through 1.10.3 library during an attempted parse of acrafted HDF file, because of incorrect protection against division by zero.It could allow a remote denial of service attack.

criterions.comment: hdf5 package in oracular is affected and needs fixing.
